title: Greg and Nick Fix the News! (w/Andrew Goldfarb) - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 03.28.18
description:
Thanks to Hims for sponsoring this episode. Get a trial month of Hims for just $5 today at http://forhims.com/morningshow

Greg and Nick talk Corey Feldman, Deadpool and Donald Glover, and fix an egregious oversight in and IGN news story.

-Corey Feldman claims he was stabbed (16:30 mins)
-Deadpool poster (30:20 mins)
-Donald Glover shares mock Deadpool script slamming TV Biz racism (30:35 mins)
-Roseanne revival premiers to huge ratings on ABC (36:55 mins)

Thanks to https://twitter.com/kumailh for our timestamps!
